text:
F. H. LaGUARDIA, Mayor
M. S. NOVIK, Director
WNYC
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING * 7
WORTH 2-5600
February 17, 1944
Mr* Frank E* Schooley
Executive Secretary
National Assn.of Educational Broadcasters
Station WILL
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Regarding your Colunbus memorandum, I think we
ought to have about two hours—we don't need any more* The
luncheon session is 0*K* if we have that much time, but
generally the afternoon session starts early* I'd even
favor a Friday session, but that's risky because some of
our people may not get there Friday.
I'll go along with you on your last paragraph—
I've always been interested to know how WOSU and Ohio State
get along-'-whether their program policy features the Uni¬
versity angle or the needs of Columbus*
Best regards.
Sincerely yours,
V%'
Director
MSN:sd
> 168
‘New York City’s Own Station”—830 Kc.
